note_from_glen.name: Note from Glen
note_from_glen.description: A crumpled, greasy note, clearly written in a hurry.
note_from_glen.examine_details: The note reads: 'MGR - Projector bulb in #7 is overheating AGAIN. Smells like burning plastic. This is a fire hazard waiting to happen. -Glen'.

first_aid_kit.name: First Aid Kit
first_aid_kit.description: A standard wall-mounted first aid kit. Contains bandages and antiseptic.
first_aid_kit.examine_details: Looks like a basic kit. Might have some bandages.
first_aid_kit.general_use_effect_message: You apply some antiseptic and bandages to your minor scrapes.

flashlight.name: Flashlight
flashlight.examine_details: It feels light and flimsy. Takes standard batteries.

movie_ticket.name: Movie Ticket
movie_ticket.description: A ticket stub for a movie.
movie_ticket.examine_details: Hey wait - this ticket is for 'Dead Bitches 3D', showing at 7:00 PM in Auditorium #8.

note_from_concessions.name: Note from Concessions
note_from_concessions.description: A note written on a napkin, left at the concessions stand.
note_from_concessions.examine_details: The note is written in blue ink on a napkin. It reads: 'Had to borrow the flashlight - will be at Concessions for a bit.'
